name: v1.2.6
body:
- Add roller shutter (MSR100) support
- Add thermostat (MTS200) support
- Implement support for LAN-LOCAL HTTP transport mode
- Update dependency to low-level meross_iot library (0.4.5.0)

name: v1.2.5rc5
body:
## Features
- Fix log error caused by wrong variable reference

name: v1.2.5rc4
body:
## Features
- Set addon to run on internal network
- Set default values for IP:PORT when using local addon and no mDNS info is gathered.

name: v1.2.5rc3
body:
# Changes
- Set addon to run on host network to make mDNS work
- Improve setup & UI experience

name: v1.2.5rc2
body:
# Features
Fixes import error preventing component from loading

name: v1.2.4rc1
body:
## Features
- Updated low-level library to MerossIot v0.4.4.7

name: v1.2.2
body:
# Features
- Code clean as per local-addon code removal
- Update HACS URL (#360)

name: v1.2.1
body:
### Features

- Upgraded low-level library dependency to 0.4.4.4
- Added MSG200 Support  
- Updated default polling intervals: sensor polling every 30s, API discovery every 120s
- Added option to set a custom user-agent for HTTP communication against Meross API

name: v1.2.0rc2
body:
- Improves mqtt stability
- Relies on the more recent version of meross_iot low-level library, which addresses some issues

name: V1.2.0 RC0
body: Various refactor and improvements; increased stability and connection drop recovery.

name: Version 1.1.4
body:
Updated README documentation (added configuration and improved setup instructions)
Updated translations
Added version key to make this component work again with latest version of HA

name: Version 1.0.6 Beta 1
body: This beta version performs some tweaking on default api-rate limiter values to avoid Meross ban addressing #172.

name: Version 1.0.5
body:
This version of the component fixes some bugs regarding online push notifications handlers. More specifically, the previous version was wrongly reporting devices as _unavailable_ and failed to restore correct availability status when the device came back online.

It also handles changes occurred with the latest MTS100V3 Firmware.

name: Version v1.0.4-post1
body: This component version addresses important problems as frequent disconnections and fixes some issues occurring when a connection drop occurrs. It's based on the latest MerossIot library v0.4.1.0rc4, which also implements strict API flood limits to avoid banning from Meross MQTT cloud.

name: Pre-Release v1.0.4-alpha.1
body:
This **alpha version** of the library increases sensor reactivity while introducing a new way for limiting API calls to MQTT meross broker. 
It also adds a Sensor on HA to show/log current API rate being issued against the Meross MQTT cloud.

![Capture](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4648843/98048446-fbb16280-1e2d-11eb-9902-945da6ce29d1.PNG)

name: Version 1.0.3
body: Fixed #149 by referencing latest low-level meross_iot library. This resolves the compatibility issues with Homeassistant 0.116.X,

name: Version 1.0.2
body:
Added translations for spanish and french. 
Fixes #137 .

name: v1.0.1 Release Candidate
body:
Introduces the following:
- Lowers minimum sensor polling interval to 15 seconds
- Implements token bucket API rate limiter for Sensor API with following parameters: 2 calls per second, 10 max tokens

name: Meross HomeAssistant v1.0.0
body: First stable release of the new Meross HomeAssistant component based on the new low level python library MerossIot.

name: 0.4.X.X - Beta release 1
body:
Beta version of the new component that uses new 0.4.X.X low-level library. 

What has changed:
- Added support for Meross Smart Humidifier
- Minor fixes 
- Revised logging severity

name: Alpha release 4
body:
Fourth alpha release using 0.4.X.X meross_iot low-level library.

Among the major improvements:

- Basic handling sensor API call limits via Throttling utility (this still requires much improvement, but it's a first test)
- Supporting Valve sensors
- Implemented Thermostat entity
- The new low-level library fixes the version of AIOHTTP to 3.6.1 to solve problems with HA

name: Alpha release 3
body:
Third alpha release using 0.4.X.X meross_iot low-level library.

Among the major improvements:
- Entity naming system revised
- Improved online/offline checks
- Hooked Bind and Unbind events from low-level meross_iot library

name: Alpha release 2
body:
Second alpha release using 0.4.X.X meross_iot low-level library. 

Current release supports the following
- [x] Automatic discovery of new devices
- [x] Smart Switches (mss310, mss210, mss425, mss530h, ...)
- [x] MS100 Sensors (Humidity and Temperature)
- [x] **MSS310 power sensor (Partial implementation)**
- [x] Garage Opener (MSG100)
- [x] Smart bulbs with RGB support
- [x] **Implement switch discovery poisoning (preventing adding switches entities for non-switches entities as Garage Door Openers)**
- [x] **Automatically update device status on connection drop/restore**
- [x] **Improve polling system (related to previous point)**
- [ ] Smart thermostats
- [ ] Smart Humidifier

name: First HACS Release
body: This is the first release to be published with HACS

name: First alpha release
body: First release of the homeassistant environment for controlling Meross devices via MerossIot library.
